body_html:
hi
i got same problem and after 4 days i finally fixed it.

i installed any update that available and tried any solution in the internet.

i've found the solution me myself after 4 days :)))

unfortunately the Linux system dont recognize your second graphic cart (usually NVIDIA cards) until your system BIOS is UEFI.
you must change it to Legacy support and reinstall ubuntu.
after reinstall that you need to update your graphic cart in additional driver to active it.

cheers.

body:
hi
i got same problem and after 4 days i finally fixed it.

i installed any update that available and tried any solution in the internet.

i've found the solution me myself after 4 days :)))

unfortunately the Linux system dont recognize your second graphic cart (usually NVIDIA cards) until your system BIOS is UEFI.
you must change it to Legacy support  and reinstall ubuntu.
after reinstall that you need to update your graphic cart in additional driver to active it.

cheers.
